action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett (for himself and Mr. Garamendi) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to include education on trailer safety in State highway safety programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Trailer Safety Improvement Act.
